barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.desc: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.

bard.name: Bard
bard.desc: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.desc: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

druid.name: Druid
druid.desc: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature— moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning— and adopting animal forms.

fighter.name: Fighter
fighter.desc: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

monk.name: Monk
monk.desc: An master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.desc: All armor, shields, simple and martial weapons.

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.desc: Light and medium armor, shields, simple and martial weapons.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.desc: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

sorcerer.name: Sorcerer
sorcerer.desc: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.desc: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.desc: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.
